sentences.sentence: God sent an evil spirit between Abimelech and the citizens of Shechem, who acted treacherously against Abimelech.
sentences.translation: 神使恶魔降在亚比·米勒和示剑人中间，示剑人就以诡诈待亚比·米勒。

sentences.sentence: Why do we deal treacherously every man against his brother, by profaning the covenant of our fathers?
sentences.translation: 我们各人怎吗以诡诈待弟兄，背弃了神与我们列祖所立的约呢。
